targets.query: SELECT mean("mean") FROM "autogen"."http_server_requests" WHERE ("serviceName" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_name$/ AND "serviceIndex" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_host$/ AND "uri" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_uri$/ AND "status" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_status$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "serviceIndex", "status"

SELECT "value" FROM "system_cpu_usage" WHERE ("serviceName" = 'letv-mas-router-tvproxy' AND ("serviceIndex" = '10.124.148.37:9001' OR "serviceIndex" = '10.124.148.32:9001')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "serviceIndex"

SELECT "count" FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("serviceName" = 'letv-mas-router-tvproxy' AND "uri" =~ /\/*/ AND ("status" = '404' OR "status" = '400' OR "status" = '500') AND ("serviceIndex" = '10.124.148.32:9001' OR "serviceIndex" = '10.124.148.37:9001')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "serviceIndex"

SELECT "value" FROM "system_cpu_usage" WHERE ("serviceName" = 'letv-mas-caller-tvproxy-user' AND ("serviceIndex" = '10.124.66.111:8910' OR "serviceIndex" = '10.124.66.112:8910')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "serviceIndex"

SELECT "count" FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("serviceName" = 'letv-mas-caller-tvproxy-user'  AND "uri" =~ /\/*/ AND ("status" = '404' OR "status" = '400' OR "status" = '500') AND ("serviceIndex" = '10.124.66.111:8910' OR "serviceIndex" = '10.124.66.112:8910')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "serviceIndex"

SELECT * FROM "autogen"."http_server_requests" WHERE ("serviceName" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_name$/ AND "serviceIndex" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_host$/ AND ("status" = '404' OR "status" = '400' OR "status" = '500' OR "status" = '504') AND "count" > 0 AND "uri" =~ /^$letv_mas_biz_uri$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 200

list.label: host
list.name: letv_mas_biz_host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "serviceIndex" WHERE serviceName =~ /$letv_mas_biz_name$/

list.label: uri
list.name: letv_mas_biz_uri
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "uri" WHERE serviceIndex =~ /$letv_mas_biz_host$/

list.label: status
list.name: letv_mas_biz_status
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "status" WHERE serviceIndex =~ /$letv_mas_biz_host$/
